net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl

Class SimpleBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.AbstractDocumentBuilder
      • net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl.SimpleBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentBuilder

    public class SimpleBuilder
extends AbstractDocumentBuilder
    Implementation based on the paper Searching Images with MPEG-7 (& MPEG-7-like) Powered Localized dEscriptors: The SIMPLE answer to effective Content Based Image Retrieval (Savvas Chatzichristofis sent me the code :)) Created by mlux on 13.06.2014.
